title: give命令的属性修改问题
txt_content:
比如我把铁胸甲的防护值设为+3，铁盔甲的防护值设为+2，你都穿上之后最多+3，最少+2的防御值，不能叠加，Operation的值是0.
我想要的效果是所有的装备都改了防御值，穿上之后可以叠加

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
5352 发表于 2020-3-8 21:30
奥，问个题外话，有什么1.14的物品编辑器的mod推荐下，马上就给你最佳
mod 没有，而且我觉得手写 nbt 也不是很复杂了。

生成器可见这 https://www.mcmod.cn/tools/cbcreator/

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
可以叠加的。UUIDMost  UUIDLeast 和别的物品设置不一样就能叠加。

一样就是覆盖

xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-8 21:07
可以叠加的。UUIDMost  UUIDLeast 和别的物品设置不一样就能叠加。

一样就是覆盖 ...
不一样？这两个到底该怎么写，谢谢大佬

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
5352 发表于 2020-3-8 21:11
不一样？这两个到底该怎么写，谢谢大佬
你让我看看你的命令，我帮你改改。

你可是连游戏版本都没说呢

本帖最后由 5352 于 2020-3-8 21:16 编辑 
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-8 21:12
你让我看看你的命令，我帮你改改。

你可是连游戏版本都没说呢
give @p minecraft:iron_chestplate{AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,Amount:0.05,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,Slot:chest,AttributeName:"generic.movementSpeed",Name:"CBC"},{Operation:0,Amount:8,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,Slot:chest,AttributeName:"generic.armor",Name:"CBC"}],display:{Name:"[{\"text\":\"§b钢胸甲\"}]",Lore:["{\"text\":\"§f品质：§a优秀\"}","{\"text\":\"§2§l说明：§b由纯铁打制，坚硬无比\"}","{\"text\":\"§a可锻造\"}"]},Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:fire_protection",lvl:2},{id:"minecraft:projectile_protection",lvl:2},{id:"minecraft:protection",lvl:2}]} 1 give @p minecraft:iron_helmet{AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,Amount:0.05,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,Slot:head,AttributeName:"generic.movementSpeed",Name:"CBC"},{Operation:0,Amount:6,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,Slot:head,AttributeName:"generic.armor",Name:"CBC"}],display:{Name:"[{\"text\":\"§b钢盔\"}]",Lore:["{\"text\":\"§f品质：§a优秀\"}","{\"text\":\"§2§l说明：§b由纯铁打制，坚硬无比\"}","{\"text\":\"§a可锻造\"}"]},Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:fire_protection",lvl:2},{id:"minecraft:projectile_protection",lvl:2},{id:"minecraft:protection",lvl:2}]} 1
版本是1.14

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
5352 发表于 2020-3-8 21:14
版本是1.14
give @p minecraft:iron_chestplate{AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,Amount:0.05,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,Slot:chest,AttributeName:"generic.movementSpeed",Name:"CBC"},{Operation:0,Amount:8,UUIDLeast:2L,UUIDMost:2L,Slot:chest,AttributeName:"generic.armor",Name:"CBC"}],display:{Name:"[{\"text\":\"§b钢胸甲\"}]",Lore:["{\"text\":\"§f品质：§a优秀\"}","{\"text\":\"§2§l说明：§b由纯铁打制，坚硬无比\"}","{\"text\":\"§a可锻造\"}"]},Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:fire_protection",lvl:2},{id:"minecraft:projectile_protection",lvl:2},{id:"minecraft:protection",lvl:2}]} 1 give @p minecraft:iron_helmet{AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,Amount:0.05,UUIDLeast:3L,UUIDMost:3L,Slot:head,AttributeName:"generic.movementSpeed",Name:"CBC"},{Operation:0,Amount:6,UUIDLeast:4L,UUIDMost:4L,Slot:head,AttributeName:"generic.armor",Name:"CBC"}],display:{Name:"[{\"text\":\"§b钢盔\"}]",Lore:["{\"text\":\"§f品质：§a优秀\"}","{\"text\":\"§2§l说明：§b由纯铁打制，坚硬无比\"}","{\"text\":\"§a可锻造\"}"]},Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:fire_protection",lvl:2},{id:"minecraft:projectile_protection",lvl:2},{id:"minecraft:protection",lvl:2}]} 1

这样就差不多了

xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-8 21:19
give @p minecraft:iron_chestplate{AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,Amount:0.05,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMo ...
我能不能不加UUIDMost ，UUIDLeast 修改物品属性，那我要弄很多装备岂不是很麻烦

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 xmdhs 于 2020-3-8 21:26 编辑 
5352 发表于 2020-3-8 21:23
我能不能不加UUIDMost ，UUIDLeast 修改物品属性，那我要弄很多装备岂不是很麻烦 ...
不能。必须要加 UUIDMost  和 UUIDLeast

你只要头脚胸腿的不一样不就行了，不同装备一样也没事

xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-8 21:25
不能。必须要加 UUIDMost  和 UUIDLeast

你只要头脚胸腿的不一样不就行了，不同装备一样也没事 ...
